r.s: Driver based class to calculate holidays.
r.d: Date_Holidays helps you calculating the dates and titles of holidays and other special celebrations. The calculation is driver-based so it is easy to add new drivers that calculate a country's holidays. The methods of the class can be used to get a holiday's date and title in various languages.
r.n: - Fixed bug #10220: Don't set locale automatically - Added Irish holidays/filters, contributed by Ken Guest - Added Austrian holidays, contributed by Klemens Ullmann
